com.netscape.cms.profile.def

Class NSCCommentExtDefault

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netscape.cms.profile.def.EnrollDefault
      • com.netscape.cms.profile.def.EnrollExtDefault
        • com.netscape.cms.profile.def.NSCCommentExtDefault
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICertInfoPolicyDefault, IPolicyDefault, IConfigTemplate

    public class NSCCommentExtDefault
extends EnrollExtDefault
    This class implements an enrollment default policy that populates a Netscape comment extension into the certificate template.
    Version:
    $Revision$, $Date$
